author: knash
body:
This is a requested change to the jetID code to support the Winter16 TIGHTLEPVETO operating point.  

Additionally, a type-mismatch issue was found when setting custom user parameters.  This issue would have resulted in an error in the case where a user wanted to supply a custom operating point for a specific JetID variable.  This is a yet to be used functionality and does not affect the JetID value in any way, but in theory it should be useable for internal tests.
title: Winter16 jetID update to include lepton veto
